import React from "react"; import InputGroup from "react-bootstrap/InputGroup"; import FormControl from "react-bootstrap/FormControl"; import SendButton from "../SendButton/SendButton"; const LoanForm = () => { return ( <>

Request Loan
@ Name abc@gmail.com Rp .00 Problem Explaination
